mapper.select: select p.PersonpageId, p.UserID,u.UserName,u.LogonName,u.Education, u.PhotoUrl,u.Email,p.Supervisor, p.Biography, p.Research,p.MailAddress ,field_1 ,field_2 ,field_3,field_4 ,field_5 ,field_6 ,field_7 ,field_8 ,field_9 ,field_10 from lab_personpage p join lab_user u on p.UserID = u.UserID where p.UserID=#{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into lab_personpage (PersonpageId, UserID, MailAddress, Supervisor, Biography, Research, field_1, field_2, field_3, field_4, field_5, field_6, field_7, field_8, field_9, field_10) values (#{personpageid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mailAddress,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{supervisor,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{biography,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{research,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{field_1,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{field_2,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{field_3,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{field_4,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{field_5,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{field_6,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{field_7,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{field_8,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{field_9,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{field_10,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
